news.title: Hanoi to turn Hoa Lac into sci-tech hub
news.description: The new urban area is expected to become a driving force for socio-economic development of suburban districts.

news.title: Hanoi targets higher administrative reform performance in 2020
news.description: Starting from this year, Hanoi would publicize results of public satisfaction and administrative reform index of local agencies on an annual basis.
